tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE mapping_information ( 
    map_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    latitude DECIMAL(10, 6), 
    longitude DECIMAL(10, 6), 
    road_type VARCHAR(50), 
    lane_information JSON, 
    traffic_signs JSON 
);

CREATE TABLE mapping_information (
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    car_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    map_data JSON,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE navigation_data (
    navigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    car_id INT,
    destination_id INT,
    route JSON,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT NOT NULL,
    reading_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    sensor_value FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Roads (
    road_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    road_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    road_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_point_id INT NOT NULL,
    end_point_id INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE TrafficSigns (
    sign_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sign_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    sign_description TEXT,
    longitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
    latitude FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Vehicles (
    vehicle_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    production_year INT NOT NULL,
    color VARCHAR(50)
);
